name: 李俊賢
objective:
數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態方程式，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析，時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
Teaching Topics: Transfer function, time response, equivalent systems, stability, steady-state errors, root locus techniques, frequency response techniques, controller design, and state space approach
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction (Ch. 1)
Week 2: Modeling in the Frequency Domain (Ch. 2)
Week 3-4: Time Response (Ch. 4)
Week 5-6: Reduction of Multiple Subsystems (Ch. 5)
Week 7-8: Stability (Ch. 6)
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Steady-State Errors (Ch. 7)
Week 11-13: Root Locus Techniques & Design (Ch. 8-9)
Week 14-16: Frequency Response Techniques & Design (Ch. 10-11)
Week 17: State Space Approach (Ch. 3, 12)
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: Textbook: Norman S. Nise, Control Systems Engineering, 5-8/e, John Wiley & Sons, 2008-2019 (滄海圖書代理).
consultation: 請 email 至授課教師洽詢課程相關資訊。課程動態資訊，將更新於北科 i 學園 PLUS。
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
